attributes.action: Women how have lost their child should be entitled to the choice of cesarean.
attributes.additional_details: I feel mothers should have the right to choose how they deliver their baby. As it gives them some sort of control to whats going on in a situation where they couldn't control what happened to there child in the first. I would like the government to allow mothers who have there lost the child the right to choose if they'd like cesarean. So many women I know who wanted the choice and so many women agree as it would of helped them mentally too.

rejection.details: Please see: Give women who's babies are stillborn a choice of c section or natural labour.
